name: SwipeHome
shortDescription: Swipe down on the springboard card to close all apps, or swipe up on the springboard card to respring. Also option to keep "Now Playing app open.    Changes(0.1.8): Closes switcher after closing all apps now and fixed description. New invert gesture option and disable which gesture is enabled. Closes switcher instead of opening Now Playing app always.
author: Skyler Kansala
